title: The Eternal forest
creator_credit: U.S.A Department of Agriculture and United States. Forest Service
brief_description: The story of North America’s primeval forests showing early neglect in the years of America’s growth and expansion, as opposed to today’s sensible balance between the use of forest resources and their protection for future generations
